root.name: WWE Survivor Series
root.description: CharactersThere are 16 superstars from Smackdown and RAW for you to select from, each character has at least one unique finisher that he can preform. The game was notable for missing out signature finishing moves of certain characters, for example Rey Mysterio can not do his patented "619" move. Randy Orton Triple HBooker TEdgeShawn MichaelsJohn CenaChristianKurt AngleChris BenoitChavo GuerreroEddie GuerreroChris JerichoRob Van DamRey MysterioKaneUndertaker
